thread.section_title: Forzieri Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Forzieri | forzieri.com
thread.title: Marta

author: Marta
title: Marta
text:
I bought a bag by Michael Kors, the price was great and I had also 25 % more thanks to a promotion code received through their newsletter. I was really happy, because next day of purchase, the package was in my hands, perfectly prepared with care and love. Great also the message in a card to thank me for the purchase. Really great company and great service. I read other reviews and I hope people are honest in this activity that is very important for all customers and the company.
For me 5 stars. I recommend.
